department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-12-05 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada wishes to acquire one (1) Portable Hydraulic Power Unit (HPU) with which to power hydraulic cranes aboard workboats.
full_summary:
=================
### EP168-240090: Portable Hydraulic Power Unit for Barge Cranes

#### Solicitation Details
 Solllicitation Number: WS4228465932
 Reference Number: Document 4279527028
 Amendment Number: 4
 Publication Date: October 27, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
 [Closing Date] - December 5, 2023
 Time: 14:00 EST
 Late submissions will not be accepted.

#### Procurement Information
 • Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
 • Procurement Category: Goods
 • Best Value Criterion: Lowest Price
 Trade Agreements: Procurement subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
 Regions of Opportunity: None
 Regions of Delivery: Winnipeg

#### Event Summary
The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada is seeking to acquire one (1) Portable Hydraulic Power Unit (HPU) to power hydraulic cranes aboard workboats.

#### Contact Information
 Luke Cao (SPAC/PSPC)
 Email: [luke.cao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:luke.cao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
 Please contact the above individual for further information.

#### Notice and Attachments
 The tender notice is available on the Ariba Discovery platform:
   [Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17849450?extsite=MTc4NDk0NTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

Additionally, additional documents and specifications for the Portable Hydraulic Power Unit can be viewed on the Canada Buys Solicitation page.

Any tenders submitted after the specified closing date and time of December 5, 2023 at 14:00 EST will not be considered. The Government of Canada is not responsible for any errors or omissions in this solicitation package.  If there are any discrepancies, please contact the sole Point of Contact listed above for clarification prior to submission. We appreciate your prompt attention to this RFP and look forward to receiving your proposal.

* TENDU ANNUÉE *
